name: MIS Admissions and Discharges NSR2503
description: MOV0054 v3.0 Last Modified: 10/02/2021 Outputs a list of Receptions and Discharges into and Establishment for a specified date range in the past by movement type.

dataset.name: Receptions and Discharges
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY || AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, 'MM')) AS MONTH_OF_MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_ FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV WHERE (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('30-09-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE = 'Admission') GROUP BY AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, 'MM')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY || AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, 'MM')) AS MONTH_OF_MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_ FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV WHERE (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('30-09-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE IN ('Release')) GROUP BY AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, 'MM'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT TYPE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, MONTH_OF_MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE MOVEMENT_TYPE_ = 'Admission')
